main.name: David Ceballos
main.description: I am an enthusiastic engineer that enjoys sharing my passion of all things technological. I believe that utilizing technology along with innovative thinking is critical to the advancement of social good
main.bio: I have gained strategic experience from working within both larger corporations and bootstrapping startups. This in turn helped me accumulate a demonstrated history of developing applications and working with teams that increase growth and help improve those around me.
main.contactmessage: Reach out to me for any further details.

work.title: Software Engineer and Security Analyst
work.description: Own the design, creation, and implementation of internal applications while maintaining integrity of system interactions.

work.title: Project Engineer
work.description: Project engineer on the Design team creating control systems for municipalities across the southeast region.

work.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant
work.description: Partnered with National Geographic to develop and present a machine learning application to identify a manatee by its scars.

work.title: Lead Autotech
work.description: Trained 20+ installation bay employees throughout district and 50+ in store associates while being awarded recognition for surpassing sales goals month over month by 15% to 39%

projects.title: Amazon Clone
projects.category: Amazon clone built with ReactJS - (Authentication, React Context API, Full Ecommerce)

testimonials.text: I enjoy sharing my passion of all things technological and believe that utilizing technology along with innovative thinking is critical to the advancement of social good. I have gained strategic experience from working within both larger corporations and bootstrapping startups. This in turn helped me accumulate a demonstrated history of developing applications and working with teams that increase growth and help improve those around me.
